channel.title: Andrew Grassie on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Andrew Grassie on Artangled

item.title: Andrew Grassie: Looking for something that doesn’t exist | Maureen Paley
item.description: This exhibition is seasonally appropriate. I viewed Andrew Grassie’s monochrome paintings on the kind of dark January day where which the sun seems barely to lift from the horizon. The gallery, in an old school building, was viciously strongly lit, as if to compensate for the gloominess outside. The hard electric light made these small, grey, wintry paintings even harder to make out. This all suits the show’s mysterious subject matter.
